verbs.description: [V: Following] [ARG2: statements from Barack Obama and John Kerry] , Vice President Joe Biden issued a statement blasting President Trump 's decision to withdraw the U.S. from the Iran nuclear deal .

Following statements from Barack Obama and John Kerry , Vice President Joe Biden issued a statement blasting President Trump 's decision to [V: withdraw] [ARG1: the U.S.] [ARG2: from the Iran nuclear deal] .
